programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier drives Niles back from a shopping excursion. Just as they enter the parking garage, Frasier suddenly realizes that the clock in his car is incorrect and that he is going to be late for his show. He enters the garage, then immediately leaves. He is furious when the attendant says that he owes two dollars (the fee for parking for twenty minutes or less), and decides to park his car at the gate until his twenty minutes is complete. He refuses to allow Niles to pay for him because he thinks he is taking an important stand. All of the motorists become irate because Frasier is keeping them trapped in the garage. Niles disagrees with Frasier, but reluctantly stays with him to show his support. Even after he is offered several chances to leave without paying, Frasier refuses to move. The attendant calls a tow truck, and is prepared to bring in the police. Niles points out that Frasier has a habit of being stubborn and trying to force everyone to agree with him. He finally persuades him to leave before the twenty minutes is up. As he pays, Frasier gets himself in more trouble with a long-winded speech. Roz must fill in for Frasier while he is at the garage. After Kenny encourages her to take some calls, her advice to one caller inadvertently exposes the fact that she slept with Frasier. Meanwhile, Eddie has an unusual reaction as Daphne moves the rest of her belongings out of Frasier's apartment. She realizes how much Martin is going to miss her, and sets up a regular outing for the three of them.

programme.title: Sticky TV

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: After being expelled from a number of expensive schools, R.J., Robin's rich, careless, teenage nephew, arrives at the estate to be reformed and educated by Higgins. R.J., however, has other ideas and decides to impersonate Thomas after being impressed by his adventures. Hired by a woman to find the only witness to her husband's murder, R.J. manages to get Thomas and everyone else involved in the case targeted for death by the men who killed the woman's husband.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: After the agent tells Robert he has a unique look, he convinces him to pose for head shots with their ""in-house"" photographer. But when Robert and Ray return for the pictures, they are surprised to find the modeling agency has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: The Nation
programme.desc: Hosted by Stephen Parker and Duncan Garner, The Nation is an in depth weekly current affairs show focusing on the major players and forces which shape New Zealand.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier makes friends with Roz's new boyfriend, but when they break up Frasier hides from Roz that he's still hanging out with the guy. Roz gets back together with Luke and feels ashamed to tell Frasier about it since he was so supportive when they broke up. They keep the circle of secrets until they both get locked in Luke's closet and witness Luke making out with another girl. They both feel bad for lying to each other and accidentally get pushed out of the closet when Roz inflates Luke's boat. Meanwhile, Martin is mad at Niles because Niles put Eddie in a kennel while he was away instead of taking him to his house as planned.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier finally works his way into hosting the annual televised Christmas parade but he is horrified to learn that his wildly successful protégé will be his substitute co-host.

programme.title: Pimp My Ride
programme.desc:
Ride Owner: Alice. 20 Year Old Female. Owner's Ride: 1985 Chevy Suburban.
Alice's Chevy Suburban could be easily mistaken for a mobile junk yard. While most Suburbans sport roomy passenger seating, Alice's ride is filled with tires suited for monster trucks. No wonder Alice and her friends are embarrassed to cruise in this ride. Xzibit is about to pimp her ride.
Additions & Improvements: -Custom Paint, Burple, a mix of Blue and Purple -37" tires with 22" chrome giovanna rims -Custom automatic door steps -Brush gaurd on the front of the car -6 6" monitors on the floor under plexiglas -Headboard filled with 8 10" Xtreme woofers above love seat -Safari chrome roof racks -Sink in the center console -Make up kit in center console -Surveillance camera in the head liner wired to a 15" flip down monitor -Additional 15" flip down monitor next to the other one -23" light speed mobile monitor in the back -Xbox in the back -Gift from X, Motorbike helmet
Alice has officially been pimped.
Final Look
-Norrin Radd

programme.title: Malcolm In The Middle
programme.desc: Christopher Lloyd adds to his gallery of eccentric characters, playing Hal's quirky, cranky and very wealthy father, Walter, in this rollicking episode. The occasion is a birthday celebration for the old man, but the snooty female in-laws seem more interested in offending Lois. Their shabby behavior initially goes unnoticed by Hal, who's desperately trying to bond with his self-centered dad; and by Dewey and Reese, who seek some of Grampa's dough by currying favor with him. But when Lois is reduced to tears after being excluded from a group photo, the family rallies to her side with an all-out counterattack that turns the party into pandemonium.

programme.title: Pimp My Ride
programme.desc:
Ride Owner: Erin. 22 Year Old Female. Owner's Ride: 1987 Chevy Blazer.
Erin's 1987 Chevy Blazer is far from blazin' these days. The monster of a ride looks like a monster with dents galore, chipping paint and Erin even has to use a screwdriver to open the doors! Erin wants a ride that represents her hardworking and determined personality, not a hunk of junk. After all, she bought this ride with her own money when she was only 16 years-old, and since then, has sunk about 10G's into the Blazer. This ride is in need of some serious help, and fast. Xzibit is about to pimp her ride.
Additions & Improvements: -Paint, porsche yellow with flame graphics -20" giovanna rims with pirelli pzero tires -Custom body kit -Blazer dropped closer to the ground -Panoramic sun roof -Backup sensor with xzibit's voice notifying others that it's backing up -Whale tail -Viper with remote start -M.I.S. video jukebox -7" touch screen monitor on the back of the center console -Electric Fireplace in the back -2 titanium 12" woofers -2 7" Directed monitors -PS2 with 2 wireless controllers -ESPN NHL, NFL, and NBA 2k5 video games -Gift from X, Custom beach cruiser bicycle
Erin has officially been pimped.
Final Look
-Norrin Radd

programme.desc: Educational, informed and serious current affairs. Julian Wilcox and the team are back for 2010, with regional and national stories from a Maori perspective as well as international indigenous news. (REPEAT)

programme.title: Maara Kai
programme.desc: A series that looks at ways to become less dependent on upermarkets, by growing and making our own produce. Tonight: The health benefits of herbs, and tips on how to grow them.

programme.title: Kaitangata Twitch
programme.desc: A thrilling drama from Margaret Mahy. The island of Kaitangata is twitching, it’s waking up! Only 13 year old Meredith can stop it. Can she discover what it wants before it is too late?

programme.title: News: Te Kaea
programme.desc: Local, regional and national Maori and international news from the Maori Television team of reporters. (Maori language) (LIVE)

programme.title: I Know A Sheila Like That
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the lives of women who are challenging accepted female roles in today’s society. This week we meet a group of women who are at the top of their game in the competitive world of shearing.

programme.title: Dimboola
programme.desc: What happens in a small, outback town during the three days leading up to a wedding? An English journalist writing about Australia attends a bride's party in drag, and leaves after a drunken wedding reception.

programme.title: Sunday Shorts
programme.desc: A selection of short films and documentaries.

programme.title: Iti Pounamu
programme.desc: A series of New Zealand short films, news and interviews presented by Ainsley Gardiner and Tearepa Kahi. Tonight: Taua.

programme.title: News: Te Kaea
programme.desc: Local, regional and national Maori and international news from the Maori Television team of reporters. (Maori language with English language subtitles)

programme.title: Maori Television
programme.desc: Maori Television - the national indigenous channel of Aotearoa. You will see New Zealand life, New Zealand stories and New Zealand people. Go to www.maoritelevision.com for more information.

programme.desc: One billion cell phones are purchased each year globally with 130 million being thrown away in the same period. This show looks at the materials used to make cell phones and the recycling of e-waste.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier drives Niles back from a shopping excursion. Just as they enter the parking garage, Frasier suddenly realizes that the clock in his car is incorrect and that he is going to be late for his show. He enters the garage, then immediately leaves. He is furious when the attendant says that he owes two dollars (the fee for parking for twenty minutes or less), and decides to park his car at the gate until his twenty minutes is complete. He refuses to allow Niles to pay for him because he thinks he is taking an important stand. All of the motorists become irate because Frasier is keeping them trapped in the garage. Niles disagrees with Frasier, but reluctantly stays with him to show his support. Even after he is offered several chances to leave without paying, Frasier refuses to move. The attendant calls a tow truck, and is prepared to bring in the police. Niles points out that Frasier has a habit of being stubborn and trying to force everyone to agree with him. He finally persuades him to leave before the twenty minutes is up. As he pays, Frasier gets himself in more trouble with a long-winded speech. Roz must fill in for Frasier while he is at the garage. After Kenny encourages her to take some calls, her advice to one caller inadvertently exposes the fact that she slept with Frasier. Meanwhile, Eddie has an unusual reaction as Daphne moves the rest of her belongings out of Frasier's apartment. She realizes how much Martin is going to miss her, and sets up a regular outing for the three of them.

programme.desc: ET covers entertainment news stories on celebrities, film, television, music, fashion, award shows and special events in a trend-setting, groundbreaking format.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When the carnival comes to town, Homer and Bart wind up working the ring toss. A father-son team of grifters shows them the downside of the “carny code,” but the Simpsons beat them at their own game.

programme.title: Home And Away
programme.desc: As Martha mourns Hugo's death, Alf learns that he's gone missing from witness protection; Liam helps Ruby discover a hidden talent; and Annie and Romeo profess their love for each other.

programme.title: 3 News
programme.desc: 3 News presents comprehensive coverage of global and local news.

programme.title: Campbell Live
programme.desc: A daily look at the issues touching the lives of New Zealanders presented by John Campbell.

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.sub-title: The Early Bird Gets A Makeover
programme.desc: Cycle 13 of America's Next Top Model finally gives short girls their chance to shine...all contestants this time around are five-foot seven and shorter! Fourteen petite beauties are chosen to live in the model house, but not all chosen will show up... Tyra wastes no time giving the girls their makeovers, and it seems that past episodes have not taught some girls that cranky reactions to their new looks do not go over well with the judges.

programme.title: Cadbury Crunchie Comedy Gala Special: Th
programme.desc: The Cadbury Crunchie Comedy Gala continues this week with the show's best international talent.

programme.title: 7 Days
programme.desc: New Zealand's top comedians pit their wits against the week's news and each other. Jeremy Corbett is host and referee as two teams dissect the news of the last seven days with uninformed brilliance.

programme.title: Nightline
programme.desc: Your late edition news, weeknights with Rachel Smalley.

programme.title: Sports Tonight
programme.desc: Sports news presented by Howard Dobson.

programme.title: Thief
programme.desc: In the season finale, Nick ends up facing another personal tragedy as the crew struggles to escape out of New Orleans after their heist was plagued with mistake after mistake.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Agents Lucas, Mei and Tyner get ready for Sara's return after the demands are met. A tip with information about Kelton changes the direction of the investigation again.

programme.title: Sticky TV
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam, Kanoa, and Walter, Sticky TV is here to brighten up your Saturday morning.

programme.title: Push Play
programme.desc: Host Laura McGoldrick presents stories, skits, interviews and tips on the wide range of sports kids play in New Zealand.

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: After being expelled from a number of expensive schools, R.J., Robin's rich, careless, teenage nephew, arrives at the estate to be reformed and educated by Higgins. R.J., however, has other ideas and decides to impersonate Thomas after being impressed by his adventures. Hired by a woman to find the only witness to her husband's murder, R.J. manages to get Thomas and everyone else involved in the case targeted for death by the men who killed the woman's husband.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: After the agent tells Robert he has a unique look, he convinces him to pose for head shots with their ""in-house"" photographer. But when Robert and Ray return for the pictures, they are surprised to find the modeling agency has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: The Nation
programme.desc: Hosted by Stephen Parker and Duncan Garner, The Nation is an in depth weekly current affairs show focusing on the major players and forces which shape New Zealand.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier makes friends with Roz's new boyfriend, but when they break up Frasier hides from Roz that he's still hanging out with the guy. Roz gets back together with Luke and feels ashamed to tell Frasier about it since he was so supportive when they broke up. They keep the circle of secrets until they both get locked in Luke's closet and witness Luke making out with another girl. They both feel bad for lying to each other and accidentally get pushed out of the closet when Roz inflates Luke's boat. Meanwhile, Martin is mad at Niles because Niles put Eddie in a kennel while he was away instead of taking him to his house as planned.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier finally works his way into hosting the annual televised Christmas parade but he is horrified to learn that his wildly successful protégé will be his substitute co-host.

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Becomes America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: The three remaining models participate in a CoverGirl commercial and print ad. Final.

programme.title: New Zealand's Next Top Model
programme.desc: The 13 girls re-locate from Queenstown to the Top Model house in Auckland. The models' inaugural photo shoot has them aiming high - but one eager contestant crash lands and the judges send her packing

programme.title: Survivor: Samoa
programme.desc: The first 27 days in Samoa are reviewed with footage not previously shown, including Russell creating chaos for the newly merged Aiga tribe.

programme.title: Hitched
programme.desc: It's Ben and Kerry's special day and Kerry has everything under control, except two things - the budget and her fiancé. Later, Dave and Beanie's wedding at their local bikie haunt.

programme.title: Target
programme.desc: 3's award winning show Target returns for its 12th season with more consumer information and its trademark hidden camera item, exposing good and bad work practices.

programme.title: Gone Fishin'
programme.desc: Designed around a central fishing theme, Gone Fishin' sees Graeme Sinclair and team combine beautiful places, unique faces and outstanding angling in this very entertaining half hour show.

programme.title: ITM Fishing Show
programme.desc: Off the West Coast of Northland Matt is running out of energy jigging kingfish, so he tries a less stressful technique to recover, but the fish have other plans.

programme.title: 3 News
programme.desc: 3 News presents comprehensive coverage of global and local news.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Twisted World of Marge Simpson
programme.desc: Marge's new pretzel franchise is failing until Homer strikes a deal with Fat Tony, Springfield's local mobster.

programme.title: Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to France to find out how Denise and Doug are settling in to their 19th century manor house.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Born on a sharecropping plantation in Northern Florida, Ray Charles went blind at seven. Inspired by a fiercely independent mom who insisted he make his own way, He found his calling and his gift behind a piano keyboard. Touring across the Southern musical circuit, the soulful singer gained a reputation and then exploded with worldwide fame when he pioneered couping gospel and country together.

programme.title: Cooler, The
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominee William H. Macy gives a heart-warming performance as a man so thoroughly unlucky that he is the cause of bad luck in others.

programme.title: The Nation
programme.desc: Hosted by Stephen Parker and Duncan Garner, The Nation is an in depth weekly current affairs show focusing on the major players and forces which shape New Zealand.

programme.title: Home And Away
programme.desc: Catch up with all the week's action from Summer Bay!

programme.title: Pacific Beat St.
programme.desc: A magazine show delivering stories on New Zealand's latest issues, music, sports, fashion, technology and much more - all with a distinctly Pacific flavour.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight Weekend
programme.desc: A wrap up of the biggest entertainment stories of the last week.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The truckers reminisce about the past ice-road season and talk about what they do during the off-season. Final.

programme.title: Back To You
programme.desc: Carefully laid plans for Gracie's birthday party fall apart when Kelly and Montana discover a vicious raccoon in the attic right before the party is set to begin.

programme.title: V8 Supercars: Round 6 Winton Motor Racew
programme.desc: Shaun Summerfield and Andy Booth present full coverage of the weekend's action held at a circuit near Benalla, Victoria.

programme.title: V8 Supercars: Round 6 Winton Motor Racew
programme.desc: Shaun Summerfield and Andy Booth present full coverage of the weekend's action held at a circuit near Benalla, Victoria.

programme.title: 3 News
programme.desc: 3 News presents comprehensive coverage of global and local news.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart gets a crush on a volunteer (voice of Anne Hathaway) at Grampa's nursing home and decides to become a volunteer, too.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Homer is playing noisily in the yard, it disrupts Flanders' bible-study group. Coaxed by the reverend, a frustrated Flanders takes it upon himself to redeem Homer by inviting the Simpson family on his church retreat to Jerusalem. Unappreciative of the history and culture, Homer would rather hang out at the hotel's breakfast buffet rather than tour the city. But when an eccentric tour guide takes the group to famous monuments, including the Dome of the Rock and the Wailing Wall, Homer finally proves he is not beyond salvation.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Luke go into crawlspace under the house, Hayley takes her drivers test, Manny tries to get over his fear of roller coasters and Lily says "Mommy" which upsets Cameron and Mitchell.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth recall their first case together six years ago.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: A patient who regularly abuses the system calls again for help. Meanwhile, Nancy has problems with her father's new job as head of the trauma centre. Guest starring Richard Kind.

programme.title: Dive From Clausen's Pier
programme.desc: The Dive From Clausen's Pier is about a young woman's courageous journey of self-discovery after her fiancé and childhood sweetheart is paralysed in a diving accident. Starring Michelle Trachtenberg.

programme.desc: Follow Chris behind bars and meet three pups who are changing prisoners' lives, a terrible ordeal for a pregnant beagle as Lisa struggles to save her life and a bunny that makes the Bondi vet cry.
